name: Ugha Ugha
description:
Ugha Ugha had enough of his caves and embarks on an adventure to see the world. Guide Ugha Ugha through dozens of levels, collect fruits and meat.

Leave your cave and explore the mountains, caves and jungle all filled with dangerous enemies.

Game Features
• Achievements
• Leaderboards
• Multiple enemies
• 27 levels
• 9 catchy music tracks


Need technical support? Do you have any feedback?
Email us at support@ughaugha.com .


Music
Music composed by James Opie
http://jamesopiecomposer.com
